topics.body:
Not sure if anyone's posted this, but...

"Markiplier's in the hospital now.":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r7pGRMLCD6g 

Good news is he's not dying or in critical condition, so there's no need to freak out. Bad news is he still looks like death, and it might be a while before he recovers...

Better pray for a quick recovery, and seeing him back in action after resting enough will be a happy, joyous day. Dude's a great guy and I'd hate to see him suffer, or have his absence affect his career.
